strings.Value: "I guess I should think about what will happen to my book, if I don't get to finish it..."
"Of course I knew that adventures were dangerous affairs, but I didn't expect them to be so... dangerous..."
"Next time stay away from the middle of the fight. Best to stay behind me! Remember, in a battle, just like in a book, everyone has their role and place!"
"Pff, you call those wounds? It's just a scratch. You'll be fine, you hear me? Don't even think about dying here."
"Don't be afraid, Linzi. I will fight for you. — You didn't finish writing about my feats!"
"Oh, you must be careful, Linzi! I understand why you'd want to get a better look, but you really must stay back..."
"I'm sorry, Linzi, it was our fault. Friends, we must take care of our little songbird – what would we do without her?"
"I'm sorry, Linzi, it was our fault. Friends, we must take care of our little songbird – what would we do without her?"
